Dear Sunny Days Families,

We hope you’re all doing well! Here are some highlights from this week at the center:

• Collaborative Mural: The children teamed up on a colorful mural that celebrates friendship and cooperation. Stop by the art wall in the lobby to take a look—everyone is so proud of their work!

• Building Empathy & Support: In our ongoing conversations about feelings and community, many children shared thoughtful insights about supporting one another. We’re always inspired by their kindness.

• Coming Soon – Buddy System: To nurture even stronger peer connections, we’ll be starting a “Buddy System.” Each child will be paired with a friend for shared activities, helping them build confidence and practice teamwork. We’ll send more details, including how you can support at home, next week.

Reminders:
• Please send a labeled water bottle every day.
• Friday is our Pajama Day – children may wear PJs and bring a favorite book to share.

Thank you for your continued partnership. Feel free to reach out with any questions.

Warmly,
[Your Name]
Director, Sunny Days Childcare
